issue.title: [C++] Populate Substrait producer version from cmake config variables
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18145](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18145). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the Substrait producer version is hard-coded.  Once Substrait merges in <https://github.com/substrait-io/substrait/pull/342> and we can reestablish ourselves on an official release then we should update the code that creates the version to use CMake variables as described in <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14415#discussion_r999614867>

 

This will allow us to have a single source of truth for the Substrait version.
